name: 💯Word Genius: A+
description:
We introduce you the most addictive brain challenging word game: Word Genius! If you like brain teasers, brain puzzles games, Word Genius: A+ is the best word searching and relaxing brain game for you.

📚Features:📚
📖More than 1000+ levels: for adults to relax and kids to learn!
📗Difficulty increases: exercise your brain step by step.
📘Outstanding graphic: smooth interface
📙Easy to play, hard to stop!
📕Tablet support

Swipe letters to connect different words, achieve all challenges with multiple word combinations. This is a fun word link game to challenge your brain and develop your vocabulary skills. Be an English vocab master and get A+ mark in this word puzzle world right now!

Download Word Genius: A+ for free today and enjoy our game. Share Word Genius: A+ with your family and friends!
